Cicero.Damen station (CTA Green Line): Damen was a station on the Chicago "L" in Chicago's Near West Side neighborhood that was demolished and is planned to reopen as part of the Chicago Transit Authority's Green Line. The new station was announced on February 9, 2017, as an infill station located at Damen Avenue and Lake Street. At the time of the announcement, design and engineering was planned to commence in 2017, construction is expected to begin in the third quarter of 2018 and be completed in 2020.
